Control Name: 1.2 Ensure permissions on all resources are given only to the tenancy administrator group
Control Statement: Permission to manage all resources in a tenancy should be limited to a small number of users in the Administrators group for break-glass situations and to set up users/groups/policies when a tenancy is created.
